name: Kats-todo
tagline: Personal TODO webapp made with Ionic (and angular)
body:
### Welcome to my Ionic project.
This project has started with reading this link [scotch.io/tutorials](https://scotch.io/tutorials/create-your-first-mobile-app-with-angularjs-and-ionic), Don't forget to read the comments, because there are some clues to some issues. 

### Next best thing
The next version is the one in the cloud (yeah me too). Some ideas came up my mind and some were suggested... 1) connect to Gmail and add the created task to Gmail. 2) Put in in a native cloud system. 3) Enable downloading the tasks 4) Sync with other Todo apps.

### Authors and Contributors
My name is Ron Kats (@ronkats) and I am still looking for contributors, so do not be shy .... just join and help out, i think i will need it.

### Support or Contact
Just contact me at [facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ronnie.kats) and i wil get in touch as soon i can.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
